lines.text: [repeated line]
Good news everyone!
[repeated line]
Bite my shiny metal ass!
You know the worst thing about being a slave? They make you work, but don't pay you or let you go.
That's the only thing about being a slave.
Sweet zombie Jesus!
[repeated line]
Hooray!
[Futurama in-show commercials]
Planet Express - Our crew is replaceable, your package isn't.
Glagnar's Human Rinds - It's a buncha, muncha, cruncha... human.
[crunch]
Lightspeed Briefs - Style and comfort for the discriminating crotch.

[about the space ship Titanic]
I am gonna fly her brains out.

[about Hermes' grandmother]
Your granny can go to hell!
So long, jerkwads!
What do you mean "we", flesh-tube?
I don't want to live on this planet anymore.

[after waking up from a dream]
What a weird dream! I'll never get back to sleep...
[Fry goes back to sleep and snores]
Just make a simple cake. And this time, if someone's going to jump out of it, make sure to put them in after you cook it.
Lies, lies and slander!

[in the year 3000]
To the flying machine!
I'm more hungry than a green snake in a sugar cane field!
You just corralled a bunch of stiffs at the bus station and pocketed our money!
True. But in the end, isn't that what Valentine's day is really all about?
There's no scientific consensus that life is important.
[repeated line]
Neat!
But going through a divorce together, you can't pretend that didn't bring us closer together.
I fear we are cute.
Oh, niggle-snoosh!
No! I was about to close the deal!
Bender! They had a backwards time machine!
You raised my hopes and dashed them quite expertly, Sir!
